channel.title: Monster hits
channel.description: hi people, the monsters in my server evretime hit 0 1 on the 100 times a lesser demon hit 21 or somthing, somwan now how to let monsters hit bether?

item.title: Monster hits
item.dc:creator: @catthoor catthoor
item.description:
@catthoor wrote:

thx adog =P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2008, 02:04:47 AM[/size][hr]adog, i done all that and i got 1 error :

npchandler.java:679: illegal start of expression
} else if(npcs[NPCID].npctype =
= ) {
^

1 error
click on a button to continue[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2008, 02:07:59 AM[/size][hr]nvm -.- i was stopid lol, i let wan like this :

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == ) {
hitDiff = + misc.random(); //discription

whitout anything before the ) { =P
and thanks again for helping =P

Read full topic

item.title: Monster hits
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

Assumed knowledge: looking up npc id’s ctrl+f and c&p

Difficulty: 3/10 depending on if u follow this.

Classes modified: NpcHandler.java

first find

npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 0x037; //chicken attack

add under that.

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == ####) { hitDiff = % + misc.random(@@); //discription

1.#### - That is you npc id.
2.% - That is the lowest the npc can hit.
3.@@ - This is a number that is added to the % to make the highest hit.

Ex.

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1223) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(24); //vampire can hit 24

Ex2.

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1223) { hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(24); //vampire can hit 34

Now you just add the npc through your autospawn and it can put up a fight.

Read full topic
